channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Happy 4th birthday to the investr package!
item.description: I am pleased to announce that investr, my very first R package, has now been on CRAN for four years! investr, which is short for inverse estimation in R and has nothing to do with investing, contains functions that facilitate inverse estimation (e.g., statistical calibration) in linear, generalized linear, nonlinear, and (linear) mixed-effects models. A generic function, plotFit, is also provided for plotting fitted regression models with or without confidence/prediction bands that may be of use to the general user.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
